kt4j

Interface KyotoTycoonClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractKyotoTycoonClient, KyotoTycoonBinaryClient, KyotoTycoonTsvRpcClient

    public interface KyotoTycoonClient
    Performs Kyoto Tycoon operations as a client.
    Author:
    kumai

      • start

        void start()
           throws KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException
        Start the client and connect to Kyoto Tycoon server.
        Throws:
        KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stop the client.

        void set(byte[] key,
       byte[] value)
         throws KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException
        Set the value of a record.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the record.
        value - the value of the record.
        Throws:
        KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException

      • set

        void set(String key,
       String value)
         throws KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException
        Set the value of a record.

        The key and the value are encoded with UTF-8.

        Parameters:
        key - the key of the record.
        value - the value of the record.
        Throws:
        KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException

      • set

        void set(byte[] key,
       byte[] value,
       ExpirationTime xt)
         throws KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException
        Set the value of a record.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the record.
        value - the value of the record.
        xt - the expiration time of the record. If null is specified, no expiration time is specified.
        Throws:
        KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException

      • set

        void set(String key,
       String value,
       ExpirationTime xt)
         throws KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException
        Set the value of a record.

        The key and the value are encoded with UTF-8.

        Parameters:
        key - the key of the record.
        value - the value of the record.
        xt - the expiration time of the record. If null is specified, no expiration time is specified.
        Throws:
        KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException

      • setBulk

        void setBulk(Map<byte[],byte[]> keyValuePairs,
           ExpirationTime xt,
           boolean atomic)
             throws KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException
        Stores records at once.
        Parameters:
        keyValuePairs - key-value pairs to store.
        xt - the expiration time of the record. If null is specified, no expiration time is specified.
        atomic - true to perform all operations atomically, or false for non-atomic operations.
        Throws:
        KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException

      • setBulkString

        void setBulkString(Map<String,String> keyValuePairs)
                   throws KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException
        Stores records at once.

        An invocation of this method of the form client.setBulkdString(keyValuePairs) behaves in exactly the same way as the invocation

        client.setBulkString(keyValuePairs, null)

        The keys and the values are encoded with UTF-8.

        Parameters:
        keyValuePairs - key-value pairs to store.
        Throws:
        KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException

      • setBulkString

        void setBulkString(Map<String,String> keyValuePairs,
                 ExpirationTime xt)
                   throws KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException
        Stores records at once.

        An invocation of this method of the form client.setBulkdString(keyValuePairs, xt) behaves in exactly the same way as the invocation

        client.setBulkString(keyValuePairs, xt, false)

        The keys and the values are encoded with UTF-8.

        Parameters:
        keyValuePairs - key-value pairs to store.
        xt - the expiration time of the record. If null is specified, no expiration time is specified.
        Throws:
        KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException

      • setBulkString

        void setBulkString(Map<String,String> keyValuePairs,
                 ExpirationTime xt,
                 boolean atomic)
                   throws KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException
        Stores records at once.

        The keys and the values are encoded with UTF-8.

        Parameters:
        keyValuePairs - key-value pairs to store.
        xt - the expiration time of the record. If null is specified, no expiration time is specified.
        atomic - true to perform all operations atomically, or false for non-atomic operations.
        Throws:
        KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException

      • get

        byte[] get(byte[] key)
           throws KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException
        Retrieve a record.
        Parameters:
        key - the key.
        Returns:
        the value of the corresponding record, or null if not exists.
        Throws:
        KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException

        String get(String key)
           throws KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException

        The key is encoded with UTF-8.

        Parameters:
        key - the key.
        Returns:
        the value of the corresponding record, or null if not exists.
        Throws:
        KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException

      • getBulkString

        Map<String,String> getBulkString(List<String> keys)
                                 throws KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException
        Retrieves records at onece.

        This method is the same as getBulkString(keys, false).

        Parameters:
        keys - the keys of the records to retrieve.
        Returns:
        A map of retreived records. Returns empty map if no record found. The map is unmodifiable.
        Throws:
        KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException

      • getBulkString

        Map<String,String> getBulkString(List<String> keys,
                               boolean atomic)
                                 throws KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException
        Retrieves records at onece.

        The keys and the values are encoded with UTF-8.

        Parameters:
        keys - the keys of the records to retrieve.
        atomic - true to perform all operations atomically, or false for non-atomic operations.
        Returns:
        A map of retreived records. Returns empty map if no record found. The map is unmodifiable.
        Throws:
        KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException

      • increment

        long increment(String key)
               throws KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException
        Add a number to the numeric integer value of a record. The additional number is 1, the origin number is 0, and the expiration time is not specified.

        The key is encoded with UTF-8.

        Parameters:
        key - the key of the record.
        Returns:
        the result value.
        Throws:
        KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException

        Returns:

      • cas

        boolean cas(String key,
          String expect,
          String update)
            throws KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException
        Perform compare-and-swap without expiration time.

        Atomically set the value to the given updated value if the current value == the expected value.

        The key, expect and update are encoded with UTF-8.

        Parameters:
        key - the key of the record
        expect - the expected value. null means that no record corresponds.
        update - the new value.
        Returns:
        true if successful. false return indicates that the actual value was not equal to the expected value.
        Throws:
        KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException

      • cas

        boolean cas(String key,
          String expect,
          String update,
          ExpirationTime xt)
            throws KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException
        Perform compare-and-swap.

        Atomically set the value to the given updated value if the current value == the expected value.

        The key, expect and update are encoded with UTF-8.

        Parameters:
        key - the key of the record
        expect - the expected value. null means that no record corresponds.
        update - the new value.
        xt - the expiration time of the record. If null is specified, no expiration time is specified.
        Returns:
        true if successful. false return indicates that the actual value was not equal to the expected value.
        Throws:
        KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException

      • cas

        boolean cas(byte[] key,
          byte[] expect,
          byte[] update)
            throws KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException
        Perform compare-and-swap without expiration time.

        Atomically set the value to the given updated value if the current value == the expected value.

        Parameters:

        expect - the expected value. null means that no record corresponds.
        update - the new value.
        Returns:
        true if successful. false return indicates that the actual value was not equal to the expected value.

        KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException

        boolean cas(byte[] key,
          byte[] expect,
          byte[] update,
          ExpirationTime xt)
            throws KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException
        Perform compare-and-swap.

        Atomically set the value to the given updated value if the current value == the expected value.

        Parameters:

        expect - the expected value. null means that no record corresponds.
        update - the new value.
        xt - the expiration time of the record. If null is specified, no expiration time is specified.
        Returns:
        true if successful. false return indicates that the actual value was not equal to the expected value.
        Throws:
        KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException

      • replace

        boolean replace(String key,
              String value)
                throws KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException
        Replace the value of a record. The key and the value will be encoded into bytes using UTF-8.

        The key and the value are encoded with UTF-8.

        Parameters:
        key - the key of the record.
        value - the value of the record.
        Returns:
        true on success, or false if no record corresponds to the key.
        Throws:
        KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException

      • replace

        boolean replace(byte[] key,
              byte[] value)
                throws KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException
        Replace the value of a record.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the record.
        value - the value of the record.
        Returns:
        true on success, or false if no record corresponds to the key.
        Throws:
        KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException

      • replace

        boolean replace(String key,
              String value,
              ExpirationTime xt)
                throws KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException
        Replace the value of a record. The key and the value will be encoded into bytes using UTF-8.

        The key and the value are encoded with UTF-8.

        Parameters:
        key - the key of the record.
        value - the value of the record.
        xt - the expiration time of the record. If null is specified, no expiration time is specified.
        Returns:
        true on success, or false if no record corresponds to the key.
        Throws:
        KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException

      • replace

        boolean replace(byte[] key,
              byte[] value,
              ExpirationTime xt)
                throws KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException
        Replace the value of a record.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the record.
        value - the value of the record.
        xt - the expiration time of the record. If null is specified, no expiration time is specified.
        Returns:
        true on success, or false if no record corresponds to the key.
        Throws:
        KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException

      • add

        boolean add(String key,
          String value)
            throws KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException
        Add a record. The key and the value will be encoded into bytes using UTF-8.

        The key and the value are encoded with UTF-8.

        Parameters:
        key - the key of the record.
        value - the value of the record.
        Returns:
        true on success, or false if existing record is detected.
        Throws:
        KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException

      • matchRegex

        List<String> matchRegex(String regex)
                        throws KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException
        Get keys matching a regular expression string. The regular expression string will be encoded into bytes using UTF-8.

        The regex is encoded with UTF-8.

        Parameters:
        regex - The regular expression string.
        Returns:
        Keys matching the specified regular expression.
        Throws:
        KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException

      • matchRegex

        List<String> matchRegex(String regex,
                      long max)
                        throws KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException
        Get keys matching a regular expression string. The regular expression string will be encoded into bytes using UTF-8.

        The regex is encoded with UTF-8.

        Parameters:
        regex - The regular expression string.
        max - The maximum number to retreive. If it is negative, no limit is specified.
        Returns:
        Keys matching the specified regular expression.
        Throws:
        KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException

      • vacuum

        void vacuum(int step)
            throws KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException
        Scans the database and eliminates regions of expired records.
        Parameters:
        step - The number of steps. If it is not more than 0, the whole region is scanned.
        Throws:
        KyotoTycoonOperationFailedException
